attributes.action: A life time ban for the Chelsea fans who racially abused Raheem Sterling
attributes.additional_details:
Video and photo evidence went viral all over the internet and soon made news headlines. The fans who appeared to shout out racist abuse have now been suspended by Chelsea FC but not banned for life.

We need as much signatures as possible to get these fans banned for life to show that Racism does not belong not only in sport but in society.
attributes.background: On Saturday 8th December 2018 a match between Chelsea and Man city took place at stamford bridge. As the ball went out for a throw on and Man citys Raheem Sterling went to collect the ball he was racially abused by a few Chelsea fans in the crowd

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for. This would be the responsibility of Chelsea Football Club.
